item.title: Bangalore to Jog Falls Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Jog Falls can be a refreshing experience, especially for nature lovers. Jog Falls, located in the Shimoga district of Karnataka, is one of the highest plunge waterfalls in India. Here's a suggested itinerary for your solo trip: Bangalore to Jog Falls Begin your journey early in the morning to make the most of the day. The distance between Bangalore and Jog Falls
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
